text:
Premier League
Aston Villa - Liverpool live online, where to watch?
After winning against Tottenham last weekend, Liverpool moves to Villa Park Aston Villa. A match broadcast live on television on RMC Sport 1 and Canal + Sport this Saturday, November 2 from 16:00 French time, but also to follow live streaming on iPhone, iPad, PC, Mac or Android.
02 Nov 2019, 04:45 by Charlie Creteur



The winner of the 2019 Champions League seems to make the English championship its priority this season. J√ºrgen Klopp's players also played against their opponent in the final, Tottenham last weekend. The Reds conceded the opening Spurs on a goal from Harry Kane before picking up the score via Jordan Henderson and take the lead with a penalty of Mohamed Salah (2-1).







The match between Aston Villa and Liverpool is broadcast this Saturday, November 2 on RMC Sport 1 and Canal + Sport for French television from 16:00 French time. A channel accessible by subscription to a limited number of audiovisual actors. Mainly SFR and Canal +. So you can not access it via your Internet operator for example, there is an alternative solution: the 100% digital offer of RMC Sport (or OTT). A subscription available at a price of 9 euros per month for mobile or fixed subscribers of SFR, 19 euros per month with commitment / 25 euros per month without commitment for non-subscribers.
Discover below the list of supports to watch RMC Sport streaming:


iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch


Android


PC / Mac via Internet browser type Chrome, Safari, Microsoft Edge

Chromecast, Apple TV, Samsung Smart TV, Nvidia Shield, Philips with Connect TV option

Aston Villa - Liverpool streaming




Tyrone Mings + 11 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport
